name: Forged Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Mini Blue Raptor Hatchling
description:
Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine 2 Blue and 1 Green Raptor with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Red.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 Green Raptors with 4 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Yellow.

name: Mini Red Raptor Hatchling
description:
Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine a Red, Blue, and Yellow Raptor with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Black Raptor.
Combine a Red, Yellow, and Black Raptor with 12 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Gold Raptor.
